snippet.title: Em8ER - $250 PC + New Hair = 60fps
snippet.description:
In this micro-update for Em8ER, the mech vs Kaiju game, we've completely replaced our hair system and achieved nealry 60fps on a $250 PC, powered by the AMD 200ge APU, and no graphics card!

Signup today for Em-8ER's mailing list at https://my.em8er.com

Newcomer Packs still available for pre-Kickstarter backers.
